sections.heading: Proponent must produce witnesses; subpoenasThe petitioner for the probate of the testament shall produce all necessary witnesses at the time assigned for the probate hearing, and may cause them to be subpoenaed to appear and testify
sections.text: Proponent must produce witnesses; subpoenasThe petitioner for the probate of the testament shall produce all necessary witnesses at the time assigned for the probate hearing, and may cause them to be subpoenaed to appear and testify.
